alert.note: Alert for Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 8:27PM CDT until March 28 at 10:09PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County. Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Hazelgreen affecting Laclede County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Jerome. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, moderate flood stage. Flood waters inundate the lower backyard area of residences near the gage site. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Friday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 24.7 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.9 feet on 05/10/1961. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
